response.overview: Lucas Lewandowski is a track-and-field runner too busy running from his mundane life. When he meets a mentor named Amelia, everything changes; he must make tough decisions on what he should do with his situation. Meanwhile, John King aspires to open up his own restaurant and will do anything to meet his goal. These two men go on journeys to find fulfillment in their lives - but will it be worth it?
response.tagline: HOW LONG WILL YOU KEEP RUNNING?
response.title: Running the Rat Race
